<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shed Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=1060) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Tail Whip](/Feats.aspx?ID=1056)

**Trigger**
You become [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20).

**Requirements**
You have a fully grown tail.

</column>

---

You can shed your tail to escape. You cease being grabbed, then Stride without triggering any reactions from the creature that grabbed you. It takes 1 week for your tail to fully grow back. Until it does, you can’t use your tail unarmed attack, and you take a –2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.
name: Shed Tail
requirement: You have a fully grown tail.
